title: Video: JLYY – Glass Drum
content:
The opening minute or so of this debut video from JLYY wouldn’t seem out of place had it come from now defunct Mancunian heavy-pop outfit WU LYF.

Reverb-laden guitars and near anguished howls, all set against a backdrop of undecipherable visuals, it’s buzzworthy personified, and likely to kick up quite a fuss. Only several days into the year, I can already guarantee that you’re unlikely to hear a debut track as bold or as confident as Glass Drum over the course of the next twelve months.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
